README:
Implementation of dressing function calculation for a quark propagator DSE. 
The implementation is once done for CPU and also for GPU using OpenCL. This 
project was part of a lecture about numerical methods in particle physics. 

What the code does is, it solves a system of coupled integral equations using 
Gauss-Legendre and Gauss-Tschebyshev integration.

See for example
R.~Alkofer, P.~Watson and H.~Weigel, Phys. Rev. D 65, 094026 (2002),
[arXiv:hep-ph/0202053]; 
and the file Project_Instructions.pdf
description: It demonstrates the integration of a system of couples integral equations using Gauss-Legendre and Gauss-Tschebyshev integration
